input.parameters_schema_json: [{"name":"external_id","label":"External ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Idempotency token (UUID) - Upsert key"},{"name":"opportunity_id","label":"Opportunity ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Salesforce Opportunity.Id (parent record)"},{"name":"contact_id","label":"Contact ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Salesforce Contact.Id (primary guest)"},{"name":"room_id","label":"Room ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Salesforce Hotel_Room__c.Id"},{"name":"check_in_date","label":"Check-in date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":true,"hint":"Guest arrival date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"check_out_date","label":"Check-out date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":true,"hint":"Guest departure date (ISO 8601)"},{"name":"number_of_guests","label":"Number of guests","type":"number","control_type":"number","optional":true,"hint":"Party size (default: 1)"},{"name":"special_requests","label":"Special requests","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Guest requests or notes"}]
